*The University of Alberta School of Business offers a strong Finance program that blends rigorous academics with practical application. We focus on student-directed learning, reflecting real workplace dynamics. We equip our students with enterprise-level financial tools and insights, guided by professors who bring a wealth of experience. The advanced courses in our program focus on the ability to frame real-life problems, use Finance concepts and theory, and solve them using Entreprise-level data science tools.\
*

*We encourage each other to be inquisitive, embrace challenges, and value continuous learning. Mentorship and teamwork are cornerstones of our curriculum, preparing us for diverse roles in finance.*
